name: Rhythm Rewind
description:
Go back in time with this retro-inspired funky rhythm game! Rewind the track as you layer on more instruments to the song! You'll be groovin' and movin' all night with Rhythm Rewind!

~Made for Brackey's game jam : Theme - Rewind~

We wish we could upload a web version, however the audio reactivity we use is unfortunately not browser compatible!

Credits:

Colin Watterson - Code

Enrico Widodo - Music/SFX

Jameson Danning - Art/Design

Ricky Chavez - Level Design

Special thanks to Niko "Neko" Sanchez for emotional support

We are a passionate group of game design students from UC Santa Cruz!
